response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,200,000. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $950,000, which represents a significant saving compared to its true market value. This is an exclusive chance to own something truly remarkable without breaking the bank. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
